Package be.brahms.rent_serve.controllers

Class FavorController

java.lang.Object
be.brahms.rent_serve.controllers.FavorController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/favor/") public class FavorController extends Object
This controller manages favour Display the list of favour Get a favor by identifier Create a new favor Edit a favor Delete a favor List a list of favour by category

  • Method Details

    • getFavour

      @GetMapping("list") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'MEMBER\', \'MODERATOR\', \'ADMIN\')") public ResponseEntity<List<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<FavorDto>>> getFavour()
      Get all favour from the database This method returns a list of all favour Each favor is converted to a FavorDto Each favorDto is wrapped inside an EntityModel with HATEOAS links.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with a list of favor model

    • getFavourById

      @GetMapping("{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'MEMBER\', \'MODERATOR\', \'ADMIN\')") public ResponseEntity<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<FavorByIdDto>> getFavourById(@PathVariable long id)
      Get a favor by his identifier This method return a favor Each favor is converted to a FavorByIdDto Each FavorByIdDto is wrapped inside an EntityModel with HATEOAS links
      Parameters:
      id - The identifier from favor
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with some data from favor

    • createFavor

      @PostMapping("new") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'MEMBER\', \'MODERATOR\', \'ADMIN\')") public ResponseEntity<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<FavorDto>> createFavor(@RequestBody @Valid @Valid FavorForm form)
      Create a new favor Each favor is converted to a FavorDto Each favorDto is wrapped inside an EntityModel with HATEOAS links
      Parameters:
      form - use the form to create a new favor
      Returns:
      the name with the new name

    • updateFavor

      @PutMapping("{id}/edit") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'MEMBER\', \'MODERATOR\', \'ADMIN\')") public ResponseEntity<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<FavorByIdDto>> updateFavor(@PathVariable long id, @RequestBody @Valid @Valid FavorForm form)
      Update the favor by his identifier

      This method allows to edit a favor. Check if the category exist and check if the name is not null before to update

      Parameters:
      id - The identifier of favor
      form - The form to edit favor
      Returns:
      a new name of favor after edited

    • deleteFavor

      @DeleteMapping("{id}/delete") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") public ResponseEntity<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<FavorDto>> deleteFavor(@PathVariable long id)
      Delete favor

      This method delete a favor Each FavorDto is wrapped inside an EntityModel with HATEOAS links.

      Parameters:
      id - The identifier
      Returns:
      a delete favor

    • getAllFavorByNameCategory

      @GetMapping("/category/{nameCategory}") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'MEMBER\', \'MODERATOR\', \'ADMIN\')") public ResponseEntity<List<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<FavorDto>>> getAllFavorByNameCategory(@PathVariable String nameCategory)
      Get list of favour by name of category

      This method make a list of favour display a list only grouped by name of category

      Parameters:
      nameCategory - The name of category
      Returns:
      a list of favour
